thread.title: This Simple Drill Will Make You a Better Athlete
thread.title_full: This Simple Drill Will Make You a Better Athlete

author: Naomi Nazario
title: This Simple Drill Will Make You a Better Athlete
text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
Line drills are a great equipment-free exercise you can do virtually anywhere. These low-impact drills yield a high returnâ€”you'll enhance coordination, agility, and get some cardio in as well. 
The key is to go as fast as you can during the drills and take full advantage of the rest periods, says Men's Health Fitness Advisor David Jack. That way, you'll get your heart rate pumping and enhance the coordination challenge. The short work periods will keep your feet fresh, your mind focused, and your movements quick while steadily increasing your heart rate from set to set. (For another challenging workout, check out Maximus Body .) Advertisement
